TutoExplainContent: Welcome in Story activity. The Story Activity uses images to prompt you to tell a story. You should try to tell a story that ties the images together into a comprehensive narrative.
TutoNetworkContent: Click here to share the activity so other users on the network could write story with you
TutoToggleModeContent: Click here to toggle between grid and single mode
TutoGridSizeContent: Click here to update the Grid size
TutoForegroundColorContent: Click here to change the color for the text
TutoBackgroundColorContent: Click here to change the background color for the text
TutoFormatTextContent: Click here to change the text style. It will allow you to use bold, italic or underline
TutoChooseFontContent: Click here to change font for the text: Arial, Comic Sans MS, Verdana, ...
TutoIncreaseFontContent: Click here to increase font size
TutoDecreaseFontContent: Click here to decrease font size
TutoExportStoryContent: Click here to export your story in the Journal as a TXT, PDF, DOC or ODT file
TutoExportSoundContent: Click here to export your recording in the journal
TutoRecordContent: Click here to record the narration for your story
TutoPlayContent: Click here to play your recorded audio
TutoSpeakContent: Click here to speak your story
TutoNextImageContent: Click here to go to next image
TutoPrevImageContent: Click here to go to previous image
